entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
